item.title: Fast and easy gridding of point data with geopandas
item.description: This post looks at using the geopandas library to do fast efficient gridding of point data onto a regular grid. Geopandas is a python package that provides a geospatial extension to pandas – so that dataframes can store geographic data such as points and polygons. Data A simple csv of point data provides a useful starting point for this. dob.csv contains locations of wildfires detected by the NASA MODIS instruments for a year over North and South America.
